value:
$WmMPID_水着クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_Swim22,Face|Look at this place... Blue skies, white
sands... A perfect getaway if I've ever
seen one!$k$pIf I HAD to submit one complaint,
my only issue would be having to
spend my time here with you two!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ディミトリ,ch17_03_Dimitri_M_Swim22,Face|We've no need to antagonize one
another... This is a rare opportunity
to swim the waters of another world!$k$pAs students, we would be remiss to
skip this opportunity to expand our
skills and experience with training.$k$p$WmMPID_双界エーデルガルト,ch17_02_Edelgardr_FF_Pair,Face|Swim practice? It was made very
clear to me that we're here to relax...
Ask $Nu!$k$p$nMPID_双界オルティナ|Indeed. I believe we were told to
"relax and recuperate" and that
we are to enjoy our "time off."$k$p$WmMPID_水着ディミトリ,ch17_03_Dimitri_M_Swim22,Face|Is that so? I had been given the
impression that our assignment
here was much more serious...$k$p$WmMPID_水着クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_Swim22,Face|Would you have come if you'd been
told anything otherwise?$k$pIt was a genius plan, to be honest.$k$pBut the fact of the matter is, people
follow your lead, so they need to see
you having fun sometimes too.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ディミトリ,ch17_03_Dimitri_M_Swim22,Face|Hmph. Your concern for my subjects
and my relationship to them is neither
warranted nor necessary...$k$pEven so, it would not do for me to
squander the kindness that I've been
shown by $Nu...$k$pThus, let us make the most of this
rare reprieve from our collective
responsibilities!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_水着ディミトリ,ch17_03_Dimitri_M_Swim22,Face|Shall we warm up by swimming
to that rock and back?$k$p$WmMPID_水着クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_Swim22,Face|What rock? That tiny speck out
there practically on the horizon?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ディミトリ,ch17_03_Dimitri_M_Swim22,Face|That's the one. How about it?
Care to make a game of it?
Some friendly competition?$k$p$WmMPID_水着クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_Swim22,Face|I don't mind the idea of a race,
but can we choose a goal just
a bit clos—$k$p$WmMPID_水着ディミトリ,ch17_03_Dimitri_M_Swim22,Face|Then let the race begin!$k$p$WmMPID_水着クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_Swim22,Face|Hold on, I never— Would you stop
and listen to me for... Gah!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_水着ディミトリ,ch17_03_Dimitri_M_Swim22,Face|I may have won, but you put up
a good fight. I enjoyed that, Claude.
Thank you.$k$p$WmMPID_水着クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_Swim22,Face|Whew... Y-yeah. Anytime... Any time
after...I've caught my breath again...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ディミトリ,ch17_03_Dimitri_M_Swim22,Face|With our warm-up complete, now
the real competition can begin!
Shall we get started?$k$p$WmMPID_水着クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_Swim22,Face|The REAL competition?!$k$p$Sbs150|
